casebody.data:
WILLIAM BREWSTER CO.
v.
HUNTERSVILLE. No. 642P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. Anthony Fox, Charlotte, Robert B. Blythe, for Town of Huntersville et al. John H. Carmichael, Charlotte, for William Brewster Company, Inc.

Prior report: 161 N.CApp. 132, 588 S.E.2d 16.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of February 2004 by Respondents to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of March 2004."
